job_description: • Bachelor’s degree in computer science or a related field, or a combination of education and experience1 or more years of experience working with computer vision algorithms 4 or more years of professional software engineering/data engineering experienceExpertise in Python, C++, and GoLangExpertise with data manipulation, database design and management, and associated tools like SQLExpertise with OpenCV and home-rolled systemsExperience with Linux and AWS administration and familiarity with basic networking conceptsStrong communication skills to work effectively with technical and non-technical stakeholders Adapt the existing Roca Robotics recognition software to recognize new trading card games and different types of cardsDevelop and maintain efficient ETL (Extract Transform Load) processes to ensure seamless extraction, transformation, and loading of card catalog dataPlay a key role in making improvements and troubleshooting recognition issues with the Roca Robotics card recognition softwareImport new sources of card data to be used for sortingImprove sorting algorithms and other features of the Roca SortersDocument processes, methodologies, and findings to facilitate knowledge sharing within the team Previous experience with robotics, 3D printers and/or 3D printer softwareExperience with camera hardware and image acquisition pipelinesExperience working with AI/ML for image processing and recognition.
